languages.text: Негативный модификатор к значению навыка, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и прочим параметрам персонажа. Штрафы могут накладываться в результате воздействия различных {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g}, предметов, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травм{/g}.

A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: Негативный модификатор к значению навыка, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и прочим параметрам персонажа. Штрафы могут накладываться в результате воздействия различных {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g}, предметов, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травм{/g}.

traits.locale_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill or characteristic score, damage, armour, and other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various negative effects, traumas, items, and abilities.

A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Ein negativer Modifikator, der auf einen Fertigkeits- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaftswert{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} oder andere Charakterparameter angewendet wird. Ein Abzug kann durch diverse {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}, Gegenstände und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} verursacht werden.
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein negativer Modifikator, der auf einen Fertigkeits- oder Eigenschaftswert, Schaden, Rüstung oder andere Charakterparameter angewendet wird. Ein Abzug kann durch diverse negative Effekte, Traumata, Gegenstände und Fähigkeiten verursacht werden.

languages.text: Modificateur négatif appliqué au score d'une compétence ou d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g}, aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et à d'autres paramètres du personnage. Une pénalité peut être appliquée par un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g}, un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}, un objet ou une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}.
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Modificateur négatif appliqué score d'une compétence ou d'une caractéristique, aux dégâts, à l'armure et autres paramètres du personnage. Une pénalité peut être appliquée par un effet négatif, un traumatisme, un objet ou une capacité.

languages.text: 适用于技能、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、或其他参数的负向修正值。减值可能由各种{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}、物品或{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}提供。
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 适用于技能、属性、伤害、护甲、或其他参数的负向修正值。减值可能由各种负面效果、创伤或能力提供。

languages.text: Un modificador negativo que se aplica a una habilidad, a una {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g}, al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} o a otro parámetro del personaje. Una penalización puede ser causada por diversos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}, objetos y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un modificador negativo que se aplica a una {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g}, a una característica, al daño, a la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} o a otro parámetro del personaje. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} puede ser causada por diversos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}, objetos y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.

languages.text: マイナス調整はスキルまたは{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}スコア、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、およびその他のキャラクターパラメータに適用される。ペナルティは様々な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}、アイテム、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって適用される。
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: マイナス調整はスキルまたは特性スコア、ダメージ、アーマー、およびその他のキャラクターパラメータに適用される。ペナルティは様々なネガティブ効果やトラウマ、アイテム、アビリティによって適用される。

languages.text: Yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelik{/g} puanı, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve benzeri karakter parametrelerine uygulanan eksi değiştirici değeri. Ceza puanı, çeşitli {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etki{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g}, eşya ve {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} tarafından uygulanabilir.
languages.original_text: A negative modifier applied to a skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} score, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, or other character parameters. A penalty can be applied by various {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}, items, and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
